title: Unable to connect
body: I just started playing and decided to play aram. 15 mins in and i start lagging then get dc saying "unable to connect to server" my internet is working fine, but league isnt. i was able to connect back, but the game ended and i got a LEAVE for the game, so i just decide to play another game. same thing happens for the first 5 mins. lucky i connect after. looking at the board it seems i wasnt the only one. Will i be penalized for getting a leave in game?

replies.body: Your network might be having issues maintaining a connection to the game servers, but don't worry because there are some steps to help fix this!  I recommend following each instruction in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to resolve this for good.  Continuing to leave games can result in a [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) on your account, so it's important to get this resolved asap.  Hopefully, this will do the trick and get you back in game without issue!

My internet speed, and everything on my part was fine. This is the 2nd time this has happened, and so far it has always been a day before a patch around midnight or so. When the game ended everythinf was back to normal, but i got into a 2nd game, and again i got an error for the first 5 mins. It finally let me connect and after that i had no more problems.  I wasnt the only one experiencing this as i saw other as well.
